articles.title: Allow us to Re-Introduce Ourselves...
articles.content:
We swear we blinked and we were in the middle of the month of June! With so many amazing things planned for the coming months, we sometimes forget to take a moment to celebrate all that we have already accomplished as a brand and as a team. In fact, July is right around the corner and that means that we are coming up on our fourth anniversary of 437 (July 8th).

Time really ﻿does﻿ fly when you're having fun.

And we have to say, we've been having a LOT of fun. From introducing our new staple colour espresso to expanding our collections to include apparel to seeing our pieces worn by likes of Meg Thee Stallion and Vanessa Hudgens, we have made some serious advances as a company. There are many ways that we want to continue growing but we decided we'd take a second to celebrate how far we've come.

﻿Left to Right: Chantel Jeffries in the Sanders Set/Espresso, Sabrina Claudio in the Aubrey Set, Megan Thee Stallion in the Sanders Set and Kylie Jenner in the Bloom Slip.
With all that we have accomplished as a team, we wouldn't be where we are today if it wasn't for the dream of two incredible women: our Founders and Forbes featured 30 under 30 CEOs,
Hyla and Adrien.

Since it's been almost 4 years since the start of 437, we think it's time we give you all a little re-introduction to the brand and the founders.
437 was started by Hyla and Adrien in 2017 during their 3rd year of university. While studying abroad in Europe they quickly realized there was a major gap in the swimsuit industry. There were very few - if any - swimsuit options available that complimented the diverse body types of women. Many of the swimsuits they had seen abroad were restrictive, designed for one specific body type and/or uncomfortable to wear for long period of time.

So, they started thinking:
What if there was way to create the ultimate swimsuit? A swimsuit that was still stylish and helped women feel confident and sexy BUT didn't require one to give up their favourite foods to achieve the perfect 'bikini body'?

L to Right: The Kenzie x Aubrey Set in Rose, the Sanders top and bottom bikini in black, The Kenzie and Sanders sets in espresso, white and black.
And from there, 437 was born and it has grown into the brand you all know and love today!

Okay Okay... so it wasn't exactly that simple.

There were actually quite a few roadblocks from: trying to start a business with little to no design experience to sourcing a reliable manufacturer, to hiring their first employee and expanding into a Loft space, having collections arrive damaged prior to a drop, to pivoting an entire company during a major pandemic... we could go on and on (Click here to listen to the 437Offline podcast to learn more).

L to R: Hyla and Adrien visiting our manufacturer in China, Adrien's original sketch of the Kenzie set, the 437 Loft in Toronto.

With that being said, how amazing is it how much we've grown in just 4 short years? We've hired more employees, collaborated with amazing influencers (Nitsan Raiter, Emma Leger and Sophie Suchan) to create fun new collections like That's So Sabotage, and worked to expand our sizing to be even more inclusive (work that we are always committed to improving). With so much happening over the coming months, it's hard to believe 437 was once just the dream of 2 best friends in university.

Now that we've given you a little refresher on who we are and re-introduced our CEOS, we thought it would be fun for you to get to know Hyla and Adrien as regular people like you and I! So, we've compiled a short list of their frequently asked questions:

1. How do you balance work and your social lives?
We have made it a point and a promise to ourselves since starting 437 that we would prioritize our wellness. It's really easy when running a company to forego your personal, emotional and physical health in order to make sure that everything in the company is running smoothly. From day 1, we have tried to prioritize getting enough sleep, eating well, exercising and recharging with friends and family. During our free time we love travelling and also think that it's important to spend time with each other outside of 437 work to keep our bond to one another strong.

2. What is your go-to self care move?
Adrien: Putting on lip liner + gloss, slicking back my hair and putting on a nice sweat suit for my work from home days is a fool-proof way for me to get ready for the day. Elevating my work from home uniform never fails to make me feel a little better!

Hyla: I am a huge fan of using my jade roller throughout the day. It's a great way for me to take a quick break between busy meetings and I always feel like it's a simple way to do a little bit of self-care and skin-care at the same time. I'm also a huge fan of The 5-Minute Journal. I try to write in it most days.

3. What is the best advice you've ever received?
Don't take everything in life so seriously. Both of us have very high expectations of ourselves and were raised to follow a very linear pathway of excelling in school, finding a secure career and then buying a house and settling down with families of our own. While there's nothing wrong with this pathway, we do wish that we had spent more time from the age of 18 onward taking in life for what it is: exciting and unpredictable. We should have tried more things and gone on more adventures! Life is short. Spending time enjoying the little things, taking risks and living in the present is the best advice we've been given. It's also advice we hope you all take to heart!

While we aren't 100% sure where or how 437 will grow, we are confident in each other and our amazing team. We have a lot in store for the upcoming season and we can't wait to share it with you! xx

articles.title: Styling your Staple Swim
articles.content:
Attention everyone: We have some good news and some really good news. The good news? Well, summer is officially here. All those months of waiting and praying for the day when you’d be able to go outside without freezing to death are here!
And the really good news?


Your 437 swimsuit is on your front porch.


So you’ve got your staple swimsuit in your hands. You’ve tried it on, are feeling confident as ever and you’ve taken all the mirror selfies you possibly can (tagging us ofc).

Now what?
For us, this is where things get even more exciting. While any 437 swimsuit makes a major statement on its own, there’s nothing we love more than personalizing our pieces. Over the past few years, we’ve kept a close eye on the ways you’ve elevated your 437s to reflect your personal style. As a company, we work hard to make sure that anyone who wears one of our swimsuits feels confident enough to let their true selves shine through. Seeing how you’ve creatively styled your 437s has left us so inspired we just had to compile a few tips/tricks of some of the top ways to make your swimsuit your own!

JEWELRY

Accessorizing your swimsuit with jewelry is one of the easiest ways to quickly personalize your swimsuit. There are so many ways to layer pieces and styles of jewelry to create specific looks! Some may opt for a more polished look by playing with metal jewelry like gold, silver or mixed metals. Others may opt for a beachy, playful vibe by experimenting with colours and stones like freshwater pearls, beads and shells. Here are some of our fave jewelry pieces:

Stacked Necklaces → This is perfect way to dress up your otherwise bare décolletage. We've seen you swap between gold/silver jewelry and pearls, or beads to create different looks. Metal jewelry is great for those of you who prefer a more chic look while pearls or beads are great way to play with your more feminine side.


Rings → Rings one of my personal faves ways to subtly add more dimension to you swimsuit. It's the perfect way to accessorize for those of us who don't always like to distract from the main event (aka your 437 swimsuit). You can wear just one or two staple rings or opt to wear rings on every finger for a little extra flair.

shop the Leo top in white here

Waist chains → Waist chains have recently gained popularity in North America over the past year. They are available in jewel and metal tones and/or with decorative charms in various shapes. Adding one or two to your waist is a sexy and subtle way to accentuate your waist.

﻿Shop the Sanders Top in Espresso here and the Sanders bottoms in Espresso here

Anklets → Similar to rings, anklets are great way to subtly accessorize. For a playful beachy look, we suggest opting for for fun puka shells or beads. For a more chic look, we love styling with a gold or silver anklet!


SARONGS

If you haven’t been able to tell from our last few collections, we love a good sarong. Sarongs are a super cute and effortless way to dress up your 437s. Here are some of the ways we love to tie our sarongs:

Around the waist → This is the simplest way to wear your sarong, but we think it’s so sweet and feminine. Wearing it as normal allows you to cinch in your waist a little bit more and it’s a great way to stay covered at the pool/beach.


As a hair-tie or hairband → Functional and chic. This is such a cute way to keep messy beach hair off your face while you’re tanning.


As a head-wrap/bandana → This is one of our favourite ways to style a sarong. It gives you that effortlessly cool look that we know we are all trying to achieve this summer!


﻿To achieve these sarong looks, shop our Flora Sarong, Daisy Sarong and Bloom Sarong

BUTTON-UPS

Our CEOS ﻿Hyla and Adrien wearing the Sanders set in Black and White

If using a sarong as a cover-up isn’t for you, we’ve got you covered. Styling your swimsuit with a cute oversized button is a great way to achieve that down-to-earth sporty look we all love. To elevate this look even more, we suggest choosing a colour that really pops against the colour of your swimsuit. Bright coloured button ups like white, jewel tones or pastels are a great way to add more dimension to your swimsuit.


HATS
Cute and simple, but you can have SO much fun with this. We’ve seen everything from cowboy hats to bucket hats to the good ol 'baseball cap. And guess what? They’re all incredibly cute. This is a great way to style your swimsuit and protect your skin!


AS OUTFITS

Who says that swimsuits can only be for the beach or pool? This has to be one of our favourite ways to style your swimsuit. We’ve seen so many of you take your Kenzie, Aubrey, Johnson one piece and Leo tops from the beach straight to a night out with your friends/partners.


Any of these pieces look amazing paired with jeans, skirts or shorts. You can even elevate or dress down the look by pairing them with heels or white running shoes. Because the Kenzie and Leo top are so versatile, the possibilities are endless.


Personally, I love the Aubrey top with a pair of jeans and a cute oversized blazer to take my look from beach to date!


If we can leave you with any takeaway from this post it’s that we want you to have free reign over how you choose to style your pieces! When you’re wearing your 437s we want you to feel confident, sexy and happy. Personalizing your swim is the best way to make sure you’re showing your true self.

We can’t wait to see how you style your 437s this summer babe!

To learn more about our Staple Collection, visit our previous blog post. Check out our entire Staple Swim Collection here
articles.author: Tomachi Onyewuchi

articles.title: Starting with Staple Swim
articles.content:
The start of the Summer season represents a period of self-exploration, adventure, joy and budding new friendships/romances. Maybe we’re biased, but we can’t think of a better way to experience all that summer has to offer than with a 437 staple swimsuit. Let us paint a picture for you: It’s 30 degrees outside and the sun is shining. You’re at the beach with your closest friends (socially-distanced of course), listening to your favourite playlist, smiling & laughing over ice cold drinks. Most importantly? You’re feeling sexy, confident and happy in your 437 swimsuit.

I mean come on, tell us that doesn’t sound like a dream!

Okay okay. We’re getting ahead of ourselves here. Before you live out your summer fantasies, you have to have the perfect swimsuit for the season. Let’s start with the basics: buying your staple swimsuit. We have so many great options and we know this can be a little overwhelming to a new shopper, so we created a little guide for you.

Our staple collection is available in four colours: white, black, espresso and rose; and 5 styles: the Kenzie Set, Sanders Set, Aubrey Set [Aubrey or Aubrey II bottoms] Leo Top and Johnson One Piece. Our entire staple collection is made from our signature buttery fabric that feels soft against the skin and is designed to move with the curves of your body. The best part is that all of these pieces are designed to be worn together or mixed and matched to create the best style for you!
Now, let’s get into these staples

The Kenzie Set
For our customers that prefer a versatile and playful look, we suggest the Kenzie set.
The Kenzie Top is available in the sizes XS-XXL and is one of our most popular and versatile tops. Because it can be tied in over 6 different ways to create completely different looks, it’s the perfect top for individuals who like versatility in their pieces. For individuals with bigger busts, this top is perfect for you as it’ll give you the perfect amount of coverage, lift and support!

The Kenzie Bottoms, a V cut thong bikini bottom that sits high on the hips, is available in the sizes XS-XL. They are the perfect bottoms for anyone who wants a little coverage on their stomach, but loves the look of a cinched waist and elongated legs.

The Sanders Set
For those who love showing a little extra skin with a super sexy bikini, meet The Sanders set. It’s our signature string bikini with a sexy twist. It’s the perfect suit for those who prefer a sexy minimal coverage look that is perfect for maximizing a tan.
The Sanders Top, which is available in the sizes S-XL, is a sexy triangle bikini that sports longer strings so that you are able to tie it in different ways. We suggest sizing up for a little more coverage and support.

The Sanders Bottom is a minimal Brazilian cut bikini bottom. They are designed to come up a little higher on the torso to give you a flattering toned look that is sure to make you the hottest person on the beach! The Sanders bottoms are also available in the sizes S-XL.
The Aubrey Set (Aubrey and Aubrey II bottoms)
For our customers looking for a sweet and chic look, we suggest The Aubrey set.
The Aubrey Top, which is a staple bandeau-style top that is designed to
accentuate and support your bust, is available in the sizes XS to XL.
The Aubrey Bottoms are our original bottoms for the Aubrey set. They are a high-waisted and high cut bottom that is designed to cinch in the waist to give you a sexy hourglass figure. They are cheeky in the back to add just the right amount of sultriness to your look. They are available in the sizes XS- XL
The Aubrey II Bottoms are a great alternative to the Aubrey bottoms. While they sport the same sexy high waisted look in the front, they are a great option for those who prefer a bit more coverage in the back. The Aubrey II bottoms are designed to be moderate coverage in the back and fuller coverage in the front. We suggest sizing up in these bottoms as the extra fabric can make them a touch snug. The Aubrey II bottoms are available in the sizes XS- XXL.
Aubrey (black, left) vs Aubrey II (white, right)
The Leo Top
For our endlessly creative customer, The Leo Top is your perfect match. The Leo top is the perfect top to mix and match with any other pair of staple bottoms.. It is available in the sizes XS-XXL which means that virtually anyone can find their perfect fit. The great thing about the Leo top is that it is designed to give you the ultimate creative reign to style your top however you want! We suggest this top for anyone who loves a versatile piece!
The Johnson
For the customer who loves sexy and timeless pieces, say hello to The Johnson One Piece. The Johnson one piece is the best option for people who love a classy, sexy look. It is available in the sizes S-L and available in the colours black and white. It features a v-cut neckline, a high-cut leg and the sexiest backless halter ever. We’ve made the straps long enough to tie around your body in different ways to cinch in your waist and accentuate your curves.
Whichever suit you decide to grab this summer, we are 100% positive it'll be the right choice! The great thing about our staple suits is that you can mix and match to create your perfect look. We can't wait to see you rocking your 437s confidently this season!
xx

articles.title: 437: Skin Edition
articles.content:
The past week here in Canada has been nothing but bright blue skies and gorgeous warm weather. We don’t want to speak too soon, but we think that the sun is finally here to stay.


*knocks on wood*

This weekend is a long weekend for us which means we get to spend three glorious days outside with friends (socially distanced of course), enjoying the weather and soaking up as much sunshine as possible. While we know you’re all excited to get back to a more active routine of swimming, tanning, hanging with friends (safely of course) with your fave 437 bikini, we want to remind you to make space to take care of your skin and body. Here are some of our top tips to achieve glowing skin all summer long
Nourish your body. The key to glowing skin is to give your body all of the nutrients it needs guilt free. This means adding a little more fruit and veggies to your meals and drinking all the water you can. Ultimately, we want you to shower your body with love it deserves from the inside, out.
Exfoliate, exfoliate, exfoliate. Exfoliating your skin will give you that healthy skin glow. We like using gentle BHA/AHA exfoliators for the face and a sugar/salt scrub for the body. Quick tip: make sure you aren’t over-exfoliating your skin. Exfoliating 2-3 (maximum 4) times a week is the perfect amount to make sure you’re keeping your skin barrier healthy.
Moisturize. We know that the hot weather can make you opt out of moisturizing but it’s really important! Swap out thick winter creams and body butters for light lotions, hydrating gels or after-shower body oils. This is especially important for you to do after exfoliating.
Get Rest. If you’re anything like us, good weather makes you want to stay active all the time. Make sure you’re taking some time to get in some much needed rest and relaxation. 7-8 hours of sleep a night (or a quick nap in the middle of the day) will have you feeling and looking your best.
Get Some Vitamin D. A little bit of sunshine will do your mind, body and spirit some good. Take advantage of this warm weather and aim to spend at least 30 minutes outdoors a day. Vitamin D is so necessary for the body and your skin will thank you for it!
And Finally,
SPF!!! If there’s one thing we need to emphasize, it’s the importance of protecting your skin with SPF. No matter your skin tone, SPF is incredibly necessary to protect your skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays and pollutants.


While these are just a few quick tips, there are so many ways you can achieve glowing skin. We can't wait to see you rocking healthy skin and 437s all summer long! xx

articles.title: HOME is where the Gaia is
articles.content:
If you’re anything like us, you’re starting to get a little tired of the typical stay-at-home uniform of an oversized t-shirt and boy shorts. While breaking out the jeans is a little too optimistic for us, elevating your loungewear look is the next best step! This is why we created Gaia Home; a matching set where comfort and style live in perfect harmony.
Following suit with our other Gaia pieces (Luxe Lounge, Sour/Tang, Gaia Essentials), Gaia Home was designed to be soft to the touch, comfortable on the body and stylish enough for every IG picture. The set is made from a breathable rayon/spandex ribbed fabric. The Gaia Tank is a cropped fit and sports a square-neckline that creates a structured and easy look. The Gaia Shorts are a mid-to-high rise micro-short that comfortably skim and shape your booty.
Rather than sticking to a neutral colour palette, we decided to create a fresh new colour. Enter Rose Water, a refreshing pink that invokes feelings of playfulness and serenity.
Now, let’s get into a little BTS of the Gaia Home shoot:
We wanted to shoot in a place that epitomized feelings of warmth, so we took a quick trip to the Casa Alma Cabin in Rice Lake, Ontario! There are no words that truly encompass the beauty that surrounded us here. It was the perfect location to capture the essence of Gaia Home. Though Rice Lake is only a 2 hour drive from home, we quickly found ourselves encapsulated by still, tranquil energy. We were transported into another world of absolute bliss and luxury.
The Casa Alma Cabin was beautifully designed with rich neutral toned furniture, a freeing open-concept layout and large windows that illuminated the entire space with natural light. In short, there is no other place that could compliment the sweetness of Gaia Home like Rice Lake. Our shoot took place over 2 days and one night with the stunning model and friend of the brand Ange Jose.
We opted to take photos indoors and outdoors to play with open space and warm lighting. The goal was to recreate those innate feelings of security and comfort that one can only feel in the safety of their home. Now imagine all of those feelings of warmth and add just a touch of elevated luxury to it.
This is Gaia Home.
And after 4 years of 437, we think it’s time we took the next step in our relationship with you. It’s time to bring us home.
The Gaia Home set is available in sizes S-L and retails for $110USD/$138CAD. It’s truly the perfect way to introduce a little more colour and style into your at home wardrobe.
We can’t wait to see you wearing this all Spring/Summer 2021!
xx

articles.title: SPRING SELF-CARE
articles.content:
Spring is the season of rejuvenation and rebirth; it’s the time to cleanse your aura of any negative energy and welcome new opportunities. With that being said, we know how hard it can be to let go of negativity especially when life has been incredibly tumultuous. We know that as exciting as the Spring/Summer season is, it can also be marked by unwanted pressure to look, act or be a certain way. While we think that you are all incredible individuals, we understand how difficult it is to release toxic energy all at once. We want to help you mitigate some of those negative feelings. Here are some of our top self-care tips for feeling more energized this season...

1)Romanticize your life. We know this sounds strange, but it works. Romanticizing your life is all about creating space for self-love. Small things like buying yourself flowers, taking a soothing bath, treating yourself to a full self-care day, indulging in your favourite foods (guilt-free), meditating/journaling, etc., can be a huge mood booster! Here at 437 we believe it’s incredibly important to shower yourself with adoration. Sometimes all you need to feel energized is a full day or two of reminding yourself that you’re worthy of receiving all the best things in life.
2) Surround yourself with the right people. Pay attention to who you’re around when you feel like your best and happiest self. Surrounding yourself with people who make you feel whole and who encourage you often is key to improving your overall outlook. If everyone around you is uplifting and encouraging, this positive energy will wash over you too!
3) Do a social media cleanse. While socials like Instagram can be a great source of inspiration and entertainment, it can also be a source of stress for many. It’s easy to compare someone’s curated online life to your real life only to feel like you’re falling short. We’ve made it a habit to follow and engage with profiles/brands that make us feel uplifted! Be mindful of the content you’re consuming every day and make changes where you feel it’s needed.
4) Get out of the house! Now that the weather is finally getting nicer, we suggest spending at least 30 minutes outside a day. Not only is it a nice change to a routine, but soaking up some Vitamin D is a proven way to give yourself a nice little boost for the day.
5) Move your body. Now we don’t expect you to do a full HIIT workout, but we do encourage a bit of movement each day! Whether you take a short 20 minute walk, stretch for 5-10 minutes during the work day or do yoga at the end of the night, it’s really important to show your body some love with a bit of activity!
There are so many ways to show yourself love and grace this season. Whether you decide to take some or all of our tips, we want to remind you that you are deserving of great things this season! Make sure to shower yourself with all of the love that you and your body need!
xx

articles.title: There's NOTHING Sweeter🌹
articles.content:
We have some major news:
Spring is in full swing!
All around us, things are slowly starting to come back to life. The Spring season is known as the season of change and renewal. It’s the time to cleanse yourself of any of that negative Winter energy and start BLOOMing into a newly energized person! We don’t know about you but there’s something so playful and sweet about change that takes time. We couldn’t think of a better way to emphasize the romanticism of new beginnings than by whispering Sweet Nothings to you!
Adorned with delicate cherry blossoms, our new collection Sweet Nothings in Bloom is inspired by those cravings for warm weather, long days and of course, the sight of fully bloomed flowers. All of you gorgeous 437 Babes are our forever muses.
This collection is our love note to you💕
The Swimsuit
We wanted Sweet Nothings to feel daring and sultry but playful. This is why we decided the the Logan Top and the Aria bottoms would be the perfect combo! The Logan top is a versatile, minimal coverage string bikini top that is meant to maximize your ability to tan while accentuating your décolleté. The Aria bottoms have been redesigned to be true to size and will have that second-skin feel we know you love. As always, they are high waisted to cinch you in and are cheeky in the back!
You can shop the Logan x Aria set here!
We also wanted to show you guys a little extra love this season so we decided to add a few new gems to this collection:
The Eclipse Set
Nothing says romance like a sweet dress and matching cardigan in a flattering cut. We'd like to introduce you to the Eclipse set; we think you’ll get along great! We created this with the idea that a single set could take you from day to night. Whether you need a beach cover up or want to grab drinks with friends, you’ll get everything you need from the Eclipse Slip + Cardigan!
The Slip dress is designed with an adjustable keyhole in the back that shows just the right amount of skin and glides with the contours of the body. It’s flirty and playful without being obvious!

The Cardigan is effortlessly chic with a boxy cut and cropped silhouette. We added a button loop opening for a flirtier detail. It looks great over the Logan top, with the Slip Dress or by itself!
Check out the Eclipse set here
The Bloom Sarong & the XL Scrunchie
If there’s one thing we're sure about, it’s that you LOVE a good sarong and scrunchie! Both the pieces are designed from a sheer fabric that accentuates the delicate floral design. We’re a lil’ biased, but we think that these are the perfect Spring/Summer accessories! The Sarong can be worn around the waist, as a top, or as a cute headscarf. The XL Scrunchie is extra large and is the perfect addition to any hairstyle!
The Bloom Pouch
We have one final surprise for you: The Pouch. We've noticed that our totes are a major hit, so we decided to do something a little bit different for this collection. The Bloom Pouch is an incredibly sturdy and stylish pouch that is perfect for any day at the beach/pool. With every order that includes The Cardigan, you'll receive this sweet little pouch to house all of your must-haves!
We had SO much fun creating this sweet collection for you. Be sure to check out the full Sweet Nothings Collection here! We can't wait to see how you style your sets! xx

articles.title: PACKAGING PSA
articles.content:
Have you ever been out shopping, bought a bunch of things, and then returned home only to realize you already had everything you needed?
No? Just Us? Okay.
Maybe this is just our semi-cute way of letting you know that we discovered we still had tons of our signature luxe packaging in another section of our warehouse. Oops!
We want to transition to a reusable tote bag for future packing but it’s important to us that we use up everything we already have. So starting April 1st, 2020 at 8am, all orders placed with regular packaging will be coming in our luxe packaging instead of the tote bags until we run out!

Currently, we have three different styles of our luxe packaging leftover: the chic signature box, our gorgeous sunset Daydream box, and of course our playful Flora box. It’ll be a bit of a Russian Roulette as you won’t know what colour you’re going to get until it arrives. The good news is, all three boxes are sturdy and stylish and great for storage! You won’t be disappointed no matter what you get!*


*disclaimer: once these boxes are used up, we will be going back to our new tote bags for future packaging! Please note that the ‘less packaging’ option is an option we provide to customers in order to help them decrease their environmental impact by only shipping the product in a polymailer.
